item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> R: Vignettes and other documentation Vignettes and other documentation Vignettes from package 'renv' renv::ci Using renv with continuous integration HTML source R code renv::docker Using renv with Docker HTML source R code renv::faq Frequently asked questions HTML source R code renv::package-install Installing packages HTML source R code renv::package-sources Package sources HTML source R code renv::packages Package development HTML source R code renv::packrat packrat vs. renv HTML source R code renv::profiles Project profiles HTML source R code renv::python Using Python with renv HTML source R code renv::renv Introduction to renv HTML source R code renv::rsconnect Using renv with Posit Connect HTML source R code

<!DOCTYPE html> R: Project Environments Project Environments Documentation for package ‘renv’ version 1.0.7 DESCRIPTION file. User guides, package vignettes and other documentation. Package NEWS. Help Pages renv-package Project-local Environments for R activate Activate or deactivate a project autoload Auto-load the active project checkout Checkout a repository clean Clean a project config User-level settings consent Consent to usage of renv deactivate Activate or deactivate a project dependencies Find R package dependencies in a project diagnostics Print a diagnostics report embed Capture and re-use dependencies within a '.

renv 1.0.7 Fixed an issue where renv’s activate script failed to report version conflict errors when starting up. (#1874) renv 1.0.6 Fixed an issue where downloads could fail with curl >= 8.7.1. (#1869) Fixed an issue where renv::snapshot() did not properly normalize package records generated from packages installed using the pak package, e.g. via pak::pkg_install("cran::<package>"). Fixed an issue where renv could incorrectly prompt the user to record a version of renv installed from GitHub in some cases.
